title: Build Instagram clone with core social media features

requirements.text: Create a photo and video feed displaying posts from users the current user follows, with infinite scroll functionality

quotes: I want to doblcete from instagram copy same app

acceptanceCriteria: Feed displays posts in reverse chronological order
Each post shows the author's profile picture, username, timestamp, image/video content, caption, and interaction buttons
Feed supports infinite scrolling to load more posts
Only shows posts from users the current user follows

requirements.text: Implement user profile pages with profile picture, bio, follower/following counts, and a grid view of the user's posts

quotes: I want to doblcete from instagram copy same app

acceptanceCriteria: Profile page displays user's profile picture and bio text
Shows follower count and following count
Displays all user's posts in a responsive grid layout
Users can edit their own profile but only view others' profiles
Clicking on a post in the grid opens the full post view

requirements.text: Create photo and video upload functionality with caption input and basic image filters

quotes: I want to doblcete from instagram copy same app

acceptanceCriteria: Users can select and upload images or videos from their device
Upload form includes text input for captions
Provide at least 3 basic image filters (e.g., brightness, contrast, saturation adjustments)
Preview shows the filtered image before posting
Uploaded media is stored and associated with the user's account

requirements.text: Add like, comment, and share functionality to all posts

quotes: I want to doblcete from instagram copy same app

acceptanceCriteria: Each post has a like button that toggles on/off and shows total like count
Each post has a comment section where users can write and view comments
Comments display author username and timestamp
Share button allows copying post link to clipboard
Like and comment counts update in real-time

requirements.text: Implement follow and unfollow functionality between users

quotes: I want to doblcete from instagram copy same app

acceptanceCriteria: Profile pages show a follow/unfollow button for other users
Following a user adds their posts to the current user's feed
Unfollowing removes their posts from the feed
Follower and following counts update immediately
Users can view lists of their followers and following

requirements.text: Create a Stories feature where users can post temporary content that expires after 24 hours

quotes: I want to doblcete from instagram copy same app

acceptanceCriteria: Stories appear in a horizontal scrollable bar at the top of the feed
Users can upload images or short videos as stories
Stories automatically expire and are deleted after 24 hours
Viewing a story shows it in full-screen with swipe navigation
Profile pictures with story indicators show which users have active stories

requirements.text: Build a direct messaging system allowing users to send text messages to each other

quotes: I want to doblcete from instagram copy same app

acceptanceCriteria: Users can access a messages inbox showing all conversations
Each conversation displays message history with timestamps
Users can send text messages to any other user
Unread message indicators show which conversations have new messages
Messages are persisted and load on page refresh

requirements.text: Create an Explore page for discovering new content and users

quotes: I want to doblcete from instagram copy same app

acceptanceCriteria: Explore page displays a grid of popular or recent posts from all users
Posts are not limited to followed users
Grid layout is responsive and visually appealing
Clicking a post opens the full post view with interactions
Users can discover and follow new accounts from this page

requirements.text: Design a cohesive visual theme with a modern, photo-focused aesthetic using clean layouts, ample whitespace, and a monochromatic color scheme with accent colors for interactive elements
acceptanceCriteria: Consistent color palette applied across all pages
Typography hierarchy emphasizes content over chrome
Interactive elements use consistent hover and active states
Layout prioritizes large, high-quality images
Navigation is minimal and unobtrusive

constraints: Use Internet Identity for authentication, not third-party OAuth providers
Do not implement real-time WebSocket features for messages or notifications
Store all media as static assets in frontend/public/assets, not through backend
nonGoals: Multiple photo uploads in a single carousel post
Reels or TikTok-style short video feed

required: Default user profile placeholder avatar, circular format, neutral gray silhouette on light background (default-avatar.dim_200x200.png)
App logo for header navigation, clean and minimal wordmark design (app-logo.dim_150x50.png)
Empty state illustration for when user has no posts yet, friendly and minimal (empty-posts.dim_300x300.png)
